definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Gaza, Gaza (As. Ḫazzutu, etc., COT:i. 97 Dl:Pa 290, TelAm Ḫazati, Azzati Wkl:38 *; Egypt. Gad-atu WMM:As. u. Eur. 87, 96, 159, 392; LXX Gaza, so Jos:Ant. xiii. 5, 5, etc.; Herod.:ii, 159; iii. 5 Ka/dutiv);—Philistine city (mod. gaz=ah;, Ghazze, Razze), c. Lat. 31 deg.; 3 min. N, Long. 34 deg. 28 min. E, c. 50 miles WSW. from Jerus., near the sea (Rob:BR ii. 36 ff. GASm:Geogr. 181 ff. Buhl:Geogr. 190 f.), Ju Jdg 16:1, Jdg 16:21 (both [[עַזׇּ֑תָה]]), southernmost of the famous five cities, Ge 10:19 (J), Ju Jdg 6:4, 1Ki 5:4, 2Ki 18:8, cf. De 2:23, Jos 10:41 (D); also Jos 11:22 (D), Jos 15:47 (P), Ju Jdg 1:18, 1Sa 6:17, Am 1:6, Am 1:7, Zep 2:4, Je 25:20, Je 47:1, Je 47:5, Zec 9:5, Zec 9:5; —On commercial importance v. DHM:B und S 989 Gatt:ZPV vii (1884), 1 ff., 293 ff.; viii (1885), 69 ff., 179 ff.—For [[עַזׇּה]] 1Ch 7:28 van d. H., read [[עַיׇּה]] Baer Ginsb (q. v.), Be Oettli Kau Kit:Hpt.; v. [[עַי]].
